💡 Quick ChatGPT Tips

🎯

Be Specific

The more specific your prompt, the better ChatGPT's response will be.

🔄

Iterate & Refine

Don't hesitate to ask follow-up questions to refine the output.

📝

Use Examples

Provide examples of what you want to get more accurate results.

🎭

Set Roles

Ask ChatGPT to act as an expert in your specific domain.
